name: ガンダム・ザ・バトルマスター2
summary: In 1998, Bandai followed up with Gundam: The Battle Master 2, which in 2000 became the first Gundam: Battle Assault release. Though it changed the gameplay system to resemble a more traditional fighting game, seven new mobile suits were added. The game now resembles Endless Duel and the like.
info:
• 中文名: 高达：战斗大师2

  • 别名: GUNDAM THE BATTLE MASTER 2
  • 别名: Gundam: Battle Assault
  • 别名: 高达：战斗突击
  • 平台: PS
  • 游戏类型: FTG
